medical_history.chief_complaint: Recent-onset progressive exertional dyspnea, orthopnea, and lower extremity edema.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began recently and progressed in severity, characterized by exertional dyspnea and orthopnea. The intensity of lower extremity edema also increased.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Known hypertension with LV hypertrophy, normal systolic function, mitral annular calcification, mild mitral regurgitation, hyperlipidemia, transient ischemic attack.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of coronary artery disease.
